categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kentradee was a male Human who served in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, he set up shop in Coronet Spaceport in the Incorporation Islands region of the planet Corellia, distributing starship upgrades
Kentradee appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Starship Upgrades vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
